title: How Filipino Pastor On FBI's Most Wanted List Was Arrested By 2,000 Cops
content: Followers of Apollo Quiboloy, who was wanted on charges of child and sexual abuse, had blocked the gate of the compound to prevent shield-carrying police from arresting him.
summary: Followers of Apollo Quiboloy, who was wanted on charges of child and sexual abuse, had blocked the gate of the compound to prevent shield-carrying police from arresting him.

title: "India Has To Think About The Act Of Production": Rahul Gandhi In US
content: India, the US and other countries in the West are facing the problem of unemployment while China isn't as it is dominating global production, Leader of Opposition in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi said.
summary: India, the US and other countries in the West are facing the problem of unemployment while China isn't as it is dominating global production, Leader of Opposition in the Lok Sabha Rahul Gandhi said.

title: Apple AI To Star At iPhone 16 Series Launch? All Eyes On "Glowtime" Event
content: Apple has a lot riding on what would be the iPhone 16 and will hope that customers will be enticed to buy the latest models, attracted by new AI powers.
summary: Apple has a lot riding on what would be the iPhone 16 and will hope that customers will be enticed to buy the latest models, attracted by new AI powers.

title: Imran Khan's Party Issued Warning For Defying Rules, Clashes With Police
content: Imran Khan's party, Pakistan Tehreek-E-Insaf, was issued a warning by the local administration to adhere to the rally's NOC guidelines, which mandated them to vacate the venue by 7pm, ARY News reported.
summary: Imran Khan's party, Pakistan Tehreek-E-Insaf, was issued a warning by the local administration to adhere to the rally's NOC guidelines, which mandated them to vacate the venue by 7pm, ARY News reported.

title: "If You're Positioned Properly, It's An Opportunity": Rahul Gandhi On AI
content: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi said on Monday that the Artificial Intelligence (AI) can be a good opportunity if one is positioned properly.
summary: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi said on Monday that the Artificial Intelligence (AI) can be a good opportunity if one is positioned properly.

title: Israeli Strikes In Central Syria Kill 7, Says War Monitor
content: Israeli strikes in central Syria killed at least seven people late Sunday, including three civilians, a war monitor reported.
summary: Israeli strikes in central Syria killed at least seven people late Sunday, including three civilians, a war monitor reported.

title: China, Russia Send Greetings To Kim Jong On N Korea's Founding Anniversary
content: Chinese President Xi Jinping and Russian President Vladimir Putin sent greetings to North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of North Korea's founding anniversary, state media KCNA said on Monday.
summary: Chinese President Xi Jinping and Russian President Vladimir Putin sent greetings to North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of North Korea's founding anniversary, state media KCNA said on Monday.

title: US House Republican Report Blasts Biden Over Chaotic Afghan Withdrawal
content: U.S. House of Representatives Republicans will release a long-awaited report on Monday blasting Democratic President Joe Biden's administration for failures surrounding the chaotic and deadly U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan in August 2021.
summary: U.S. House of Representatives Republicans will release a long-awaited report on Monday blasting Democratic President Joe Biden's administration for failures surrounding the chaotic and deadly U.S. withdrawal from Afghanistan in August 2021.

title: "Bharat Jodo Yatra Introduced The Idea Of Love In Politics": Rahul Gandhi
content: Rahul Gandhi, the Leader of the Opposition in Lok Sabha, while interacting with the students at the University of Texas, Dallas in the US, said that Bharat Jodo Yatra introduced the idea of love in politics.
summary: Rahul Gandhi, the Leader of the Opposition in Lok Sabha, while interacting with the students at the University of Texas, Dallas in the US, said that Bharat Jodo Yatra introduced the idea of love in politics.

title: Drought Sinks Longest Polish River To Record-low Level
content: Poland's longest river, the Vistula, on Sunday hit a record-low water level in the capital because of drought, the national weather agency said.
summary: Poland's longest river, the Vistula, on Sunday hit a record-low water level in the capital because of drought, the national weather agency said.

title: Thousands Defy Roadblocks In Rally For Pakistan Ex PM Imran Khan
content: Thousands of supporters of Pakistan's former prime minister Imran Khan gathered in Islamabad on Sunday despite authorities' attempts to block the protesters' main routes into the capital, AFP journalists noted.
summary: Thousands of supporters of Pakistan's former prime minister Imran Khan gathered in Islamabad on Sunday despite authorities' attempts to block the protesters' main routes into the capital, AFP journalists noted.

title: Ukraine Attacks Oil Storage Depot In Russian Border Region
content: The governor of Russia's southern Belgorod region said on Sunday Ukrainian forces attacked a fuel depot, triggering a series of fires after Moscow and Kyiv accused each other of launching overnight attacks on border regions.
summary: The governor of Russia's southern Belgorod region said on Sunday Ukrainian forces attacked a fuel depot, triggering a series of fires after Moscow and Kyiv accused each other of launching overnight attacks on border regions.

title: Another Fire Breaks Out At Kenyan School, Third Incident In 2 Days
content: A blaze destroyed a dormitory at a Kenyan school on Sunday, police said, the third such incident in just days.
summary: A blaze destroyed a dormitory at a Kenyan school on Sunday, police said, the third such incident in just days.

title: 21 Killed, 67 Injured In Market Shelling In Sudan: Report
content: Shelling at a market in Sennar in southeast Sudan killed 21 people and wounded another 67 on Sunday, a medical source told AFP, blaming paramilitaries for the attack.
summary: Shelling at a market in Sennar in southeast Sudan killed 21 people and wounded another 67 on Sunday, a medical source told AFP, blaming paramilitaries for the attack.

title: Golden Eagle Attacks Norwegian Toddler, Killed By Gamekeeper: Report
content: A golden eagle attacked a toddler in Norway on Sunday, with her mother and a neighbour fighting the bird off repeatedly until a game warden killed it, Norwegian media reported.
summary: A golden eagle attacked a toddler in Norway on Sunday, with her mother and a neighbour fighting the bird off repeatedly until a game warden killed it, Norwegian media reported.

title: Protests Held Across 25 Countries Over Kolkata Doctor's Rape-Murder
content: Thousands of diaspora Indians were protesting in more than 130 cities across 25 countries on Sunday, organisers said, to demand justice after last month's rape and murder of a trainee doctor at a hospital in the city of Kolkata.
summary: Thousands of diaspora Indians were protesting in more than 130 cities across 25 countries on Sunday, organisers said, to demand justice after last month's rape and murder of a trainee doctor at a hospital in the city of Kolkata.

title: Kamala Harris Recalls Walks With Her Grandfather,  And What They Discussed
content: Indian-origin Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris on Sunday, recalling her fond memories with her grandparents in India, wished National Grandparents Day to all the grandparents who help shape and inspire the next generation.
summary: Indian-origin Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris on Sunday, recalling her fond memories with her grandparents in India, wished National Grandparents Day to all the grandparents who help shape and inspire the next generation.

title: Trump, Harris Tied In Latest Polls Ahead Of Televised Presidential Debate
content: The US presidential race remains neck-and-neck according to polls released Sunday, two days before Kamala Harris and Donald Trump hold their first -- and potentially only -- televised debate.
summary: The US presidential race remains neck-and-neck according to polls released Sunday, two days before Kamala Harris and Donald Trump hold their first -- and potentially only -- televised debate.

title: "We Are Afraid": Israeli Strike Kills Gaza Civil Emergency Service Director
content: An Israeli airstrike on a house in Jabalia on Sunday killed Mohammad Morsi, deputy director of the Gaza Civil Emergency Service in the northern areas of the Gaza Strip, and four of his family, health officials said.
summary: An Israeli airstrike on a house in Jabalia on Sunday killed Mohammad Morsi, deputy director of the Gaza Civil Emergency Service in the northern areas of the Gaza Strip, and four of his family, health officials said.

title: 48 Killed After Fuel Truck Explodes In Nigeria After Collision With Vehicle
content: At least 48 people were killed on Sunday in a fuel tanker truck explosion following a collision with another vehicle in north-central Nigeria, the state's disaster management agency said.
summary: At least 48 people were killed on Sunday in a fuel tanker truck explosion following a collision with another vehicle in north-central Nigeria, the state's disaster management agency said.
